metadata.title: CVE-2024-50277 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  dm: fix a crash if blk_alloc_disk fails  If blk_alloc_disk fails, the variable md->disk is set to an error value. cleanup_mapped_device will see that md->disk is non-NULL and it will attempt to access it, causing a crash on this statement "md->disk->private_data = NULL;".
